Title: Sr. Associate - Projects
Description:
Job opening for API Automation Testing
Experience-6-9 Years
Level- SA
Location-PAN India (Pref Chennai & Pune)
Detailed JD as below:
· 6 to 9 years of hands-on experience in Selenium Java automation
· Expertise in BDD Cucumber framework development and implementation
· Working knowledge of Rest Assured API tool Experience
· Working Knowledge of Git and Maven
· Basic knowledge of Jira
· Design and execute end to end automation test cases based on requirements
· Experience in preparing the automation test strategy and test planning
· Good Communication and interpersonal skills
· Experience in working with onsite teams and client stakeholders independently
· Additional Good to have Skills - Experience in agile scrum methodology, Preparing the daily weekly and month status reporting, Experience in preparing the story point estimation based on the complexity of the user story

Title: Senior Developer
Description:
Job description:

Job description:

• 8 to 10 years experienced Technical Lead having experience in managing Salesforce Projects (Small to Medium) well versed with Project management methodologies.
• He or She should be Salesforce certified and should be having experience in implementation of at least 2 to 3 Field Service Lightning Projects.
Should be having fair knowledge and understanding on Field Service Lightning (FSL) Data Model, Scheduler, Optimizer, Dispatcher, Service Resource, Work Order, Customer, Product, Mobile App for Service Work Force etc.
• Service Cloud and Field Service Lightning(FSL) Certifications are preferred.
• This Requirement is for Salesforce Field Service Lightning Project implementation.
• Would be responsible to interact with clients ,provide guidance to team members and guide projects through the course of coding , quality control, deployment, maintenance and support .
• Understand requirements & provide inputs in designing end to end solution from a technical perspective. Review and approve system architecture design & then allocate modules to developers for coding .
• Provide guidance to developers and set standards, review codes written by developers and provide a go ahead for code development , prepare for incremental code creation and unit testing . Oversee development process & Review final codes written by developers on adherence to standards/functionality.

Title: Associate - Projects
Description:
Job Summary

Job Summary

We are seeking a dedicated Test Analyst with 2 to 5 years of experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in VoIP/UCS Test Automation Wi-Fi and Cable Modems (DOCSIS/RDK). This hybrid role requires expertise in Wi-Fi/WLAN domain skills and offers the opportunity to work in a collaborative environment. The position operates during day shifts with no travel required.
Responsibilities

Responsibilities

Qualifications

Qualifications

2-4 years experience in working with development of broadband devices and its releated components
Experience in Linux and experience in configuring customizing and building Linux distributions as RDK-B is built on top of Linux
Programming skills in C and C++ which are the primary languages used in RDK-B development
Understanding of Linux system programming
Should have experience in defining the Low Level Design for at least one broadband component
Proficient with version control systems like Git for managing code repositories and collaboration with other developers
Scripting skills in shell languages like python/TCL/Bash for automation and scripting tasks in RDK-B
Familiar with web-based user interfaces and web server technologies. RDK-B often includes web interfaces for configuration
Proficient in debugging tools and techniques as embedded systems can be challenging to troubleshoot
Experience in building DevOps Pipeline Automation
Active participation in the RDK-B community and an understanding of its development processes and culture
Familiar with networking protocols including TCP/IP UDP DHCP DNS and VLANs and other relevant protocols for networking devices
Awareness of security best practices as network devices need to be secure. This includes understanding encryption authentication and network security.
Understand wireless technologies including Wi-Fi and how to configure wireless interfaces in RDK-B

Understanding of Linux system programming
Should have experience in defining the Low Level Design for at least one broadband component
Proficient with version control systems like Git for managing code repositories and collaboration with other developers
Scripting skills in shell languages like python/TCL/Bash for automation and scripting tasks in RDK-B
Familiar with web-based user interfaces and web server technologies. RDK-B often includes web interfaces for configuration
Proficient in debugging tools and techniques as embedded systems can be challenging to troubleshoot
Experience in building DevOps Pipeline Automation
Active participation in the RDK-B community and an understanding of its development processes and culture
Familiar with networking protocols including TCP/IP UDP DHCP DNS and VLANs and other relevant protocols for networking devices
Awareness of security best practices as network devices need to be secure. This includes understanding encryption authentication and network security.
Understand wireless technologies including Wi-Fi and how to configure wireless interfaces in RDK-B

Title: Senior Associate- Pricing
Description:
Senior Associate- Pricing

Senior Associate- Pricing

Senior Pricing Analyst works with sales, business unit operations, product management, finance and accounting to determine adequate pricing for healthcare software products and related services. Completes price quotes in support of sales opportunities, manages and creates profitability models and manages approval process on a deal-by-deal basis.

Senior Pricing Analyst

Responsibilities Include:

Responsibilities Include:

• Preparing price quotes and managing the financial profile of complex deals.
Managing pricing for deals for existing clients with complex histories and requirements
Modeling new business clients seeking unique pricing structures and new solutions
• Managing pricing for deals for existing clients with complex histories and requirements
• Modeling new business clients seeking unique pricing structures and new solutions
• Preparing, seeking approvals for and presenting price quotes for new offerings that are not perfectly defined.
• Developing pro forma profitability forecasts for complex sales deals.
• Developing and designing plans and strategies to support the sales organization.
• Leading and partnering with others on process improvement projects.
Qualifications Include:

Qualifications Include:

• Bachelor's degree in Finance or a related discipline. An equivalent combination of education and work experience may be taken into consideration in lieu of a degree.
• Minimum of four years' related experience; five or more years preferred.
• Knowledge of finance and accounting principles.
• Advanced analytical and mathematical skills.
• Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel.
• Advanced written and verbal communication skills.
• Advanced organizational and multi-tasking skills.
• Knowledge of the payer side of the healthcare industry preferred.
• Knowledge of software principles and IT hardware and services preferred.

Title: Associate - Projects
Description:
Job Summary

Job Summary

We are seeking a dedicated Test Analyst with 2 to 5 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background in VoIP/UCS Test Automation Wi-Fi and Cable Modems (DOCSIS/RDK). This role requires domain expertise in Wi-Fi/WLAN. The position follows a hybrid work model with day shifts and does not require travel.
Responsibilities

Responsibilities

Qualifications

Qualifications

2-4 years experience in working with development of broadband devices and its releated components
Experience in Linux and experience in configuring customizing and building Linux distributions as RDK-B is built on top of Linux
Programming skills in C and C++ which are the primary languages used in RDK-B development
Understanding of Linux system programming
Should have experience in defining the Low Level Design for at least one broadband component
Proficient with version control systems like Git for managing code repositories and collaboration with other developers
Scripting skills in shell languages like python/TCL/Bash for automation and scripting tasks in RDK-B
Familiar with web-based user interfaces and web server technologies. RDK-B often includes web interfaces for configuration
Proficient in debugging tools and techniques as embedded systems can be challenging to troubleshoot
Experience in building DevOps Pipeline Automation
Active participation in the RDK-B community and an understanding of its development processes and culture
Familiar with networking protocols including TCP/IP UDP DHCP DNS and VLANs and other relevant protocols for networking devices
Awareness of security best practices as network devices need to be secure. This includes understanding encryption authentication and network security.
Understand wireless technologies including Wi-Fi and how to configure wireless interfaces in RDK-B

Title: Manager - Projects
Description:
Job Summary

Job Summary

As an SAP BTP Integration Suite Consultant you will play a pivotal role in designing implementing and managing SAP integration solutions using SAP Integration Suite BTP CPI. You will be part of a global SAP team which will ensure that all mission critical SAP systems will be in best possible shape running with best performance & highest availability and are in full compliance with Quality and Information Security regulations.
Responsibilities

Responsibilities

Analysis of Integration requirements of our IT solutions together with internal customers and IT colleagues
Support and influence SAP integration API and data flow architectures considering API first approach .
Identify processing and performance optimization opportunities.
Proactive evaluation of new SAP features in Integration Suite e.g. Integration advisor Trading Partner management .
Understanding of SAP functional areas and overall SAP architecture .
Subject matter expertise in SAP integration
Strong expertise in designing and implementing complex integration scenarios including experience with various integration patterns and protocols using SAP BTP Integration Suite.
Deep understanding of prepackaged integration content and effective use of the same .
Proven expertise in developing Enterprise-Grade robust Inflows for SAP non-SAP systems in A2A and B2B for both asynchronous and synchronous communication.
Proficiency in implementing Integration patterns like Content based routing Scatter-Gather Splitter .
Expertise in Integration scenarios using different adapters such as HTTP IDOC JDBC File SOAP Rest Odata Graph etc.
Expertise in using various kinds of mapping such as message mapping XLST mapping and mapping using groovy scripts .
Expertise in exception handling mechanisms for Integration flows .
Deep understanding of Quality of service concepts such as Guaranteed Delivery retry mechanism Idempotent Receiver and so on .
Troubleshoot and resolve complex integration issues ensuring the stability and performance of integration solutions.
Proficiency in integration message monitoring and logging .
Good understanding of Adapter inbound and outbound security configurations .
Usage of Transport management system in Integration Suite .
Certifications Required

Certifications Required

SAP BTP Certification is an advantage.

Title: Intellimatch Reconciliation Developer
Description:
Job Summary

Job Summary

We are seeking a dedicated Product Specialist (T) with 4 to 6 years of experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in IntelliMatch MS SQL Server and Intellisuite-Admin along with domain experience in Cards & Payments. This hybrid role offers the opportunity to work both remotely and on-site with a focus on day shifts. The candidate will play a crucial role in enhancing our product offerings and ensuring seamless operations.
Responsibilities

Responsibilities

• Oversee the implementation and maintenance of IntelliMatch solutions to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
• Provide technical support and troubleshooting for IntelliMatch MS SQL Server and Intellisuite-Admin to resolve any issues promptly.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze requirements for Cards & Payments solutions.
• Develop and execute test plans to validate the functionality and performance of IntelliMatch and related systems.
• Monitor system performance and implement necessary optimizations to enhance efficiency and user experience.
• Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for system configurations processes and procedures.
• Conduct regular training sessions for team members and stakeholders to ensure proper usage and understanding of the systems.
• Lead the integration of new features and updates into existing IntelliMatch and Cards & Payments systems.
• Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations in all technical implementations and operations.
• Provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement of product offerings and processes.
• Collaborate with vendors and third-party service providers to ensure seamless integration and support.
• Participate in project planning and management activities to ensure timely delivery of solutions.
• Utilize MS SQL Server to manage and analyze large datasets ensuring data integrity and accuracy.
Qualifications

Qualifications

• Possess a strong understanding of IntelliMatch and its applications in financial services.
• Demonstrate proficiency in MS SQL Server for database management and analysis.
• Have experience with Intellisuite-Admin for system administration and configuration.
• Exhibit domain expertise in Cards & Payments understanding industry standards and best practices.
• Show excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues.
• Display strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
• Be detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality in all deliverables.
• Have the ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks in a hybrid work environment.
• Demonstrate a commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.
• Show experience in creating and maintaining technical documentation.
• Have a proactive approach to identifying and addressing potential issues before they impact operations.
• Exhibit strong project management skills to ensure timely and successful delivery of solutions.
• Be adaptable and flexible to changing priorities and requirements in a dynamic work environment.
